name: my-app

scripts.start-server: cd BackEnd && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.start-client: cd FrontEnd && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.build-client: cd FrontEnd && npm install && npm run build

description: Shiksha Samarth - A comprehensive eLearning platform that enables users to enroll in courses, submit assignments, and take exams. The platform supports three types of users: Students, Instructors, and Admins. Each role has distinct functionalities, ensuring the system is secure and efficient in managing courses and student progress.
